intro: Anotis setosa, commonly known as the slender anotis, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a small, herbaceous perennial that typically grows to a height of about 10–30 centimeters. The plant features slender, upright stems with small, pale green leaves that are covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are small and yellow, arranged in clusters at the ends of the stems. Anotis setosa is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments.
